FuncDef:
The pack enable command enables the packaging function on a board.
The undo pack enable command disables the packaging function on a board.
The pack disable command closes the packaging function on a board.
The undo pack disable command opens the packaging function on a board.
By default, the packaging function is open.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In precessing traffic forwarding, several little packets are combined to be a big packet to enhance the interface throughput and forwarding performance in small-byte packet traffic environment. However, that the small packets combine into big packet can also increase the forwarding delay time. Using the command pack disable, you can enable or disable packaging function on a board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The command pack disable cannot be configured on the board LPUF-480.
